<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sever Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=3729) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Arcane" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=11" />
<trait label="Esoterica" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=427" />
<trait label="Thaumaturge" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=432" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 47</row>

**Requirements**
You're holding an [implement](/classes/thaumaturge/implements).

</column>

---

You apply a frayed thread, a pinch of fulu ash, or a similar undone charm to your weapon, and swing to break a spell. Make a Strike against an enemy. If you hit and deal damage, you attempt to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) a single spell active on the target (your choice). Your counteract level is equal to half your level (rounded up), and your counteract check modifier is equal to your class DC – 10.
name: Sever Magic
